knimeNode.name: Number To String
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts numbers in a column to strings.

fullDescription.intro:
Converts numbers in a column (or a set of columns) to strings.
If the optional PMML inport is connected and contains preprocessing operations in the TransformationDictionary the conversion operations of this node are appended.
fullDescription.option: Move the columns of interest into the "Include" list

ports.inPort: Optional PMML document to add the preprocessing operations to.
ports.outPort: PMML port object that includes the performed operations.
